meanings.definition: To transport or carry by helicopter.
meanings.sent1: The injured hiker was helilifted to safety from the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The medical team helilifted the patient to the hospital for urgent care.
meanings.sent3: The lost dog was helilifted back to its owner, wagging its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The supplies were helilifted to the remote village, bringing much-needed aid.
meanings.sent5: The helilifted rescue team reached the stranded climbers just in time.

meanings.definition: Having been transported or carried by helicopter.
meanings.sent1: The helilifted supplies arrived quickly at the disaster site.
meanings.sent2: The helilifted passengers enjoyed a scenic view during their flight.
meanings.sent3: The helilifted package was delivered right to the doorstep, surprising the recipient.
meanings.sent4: The helilifted crew members were ready for their mission as soon as they landed.
meanings.sent5: The helilifted equipment was crucial for the emergency response team.
